com.beardedhen.androidbootstrap

Class BootstrapButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • TextView
      • com.beardedhen.androidbootstrap.AwesomeTextView
        • com.beardedhen.androidbootstrap.BootstrapButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BootstrapBrandView, BootstrapSizeView, BootstrapTextView, ButtonModeView, OutlineableView, RoundableView

    public class BootstrapButton
extends AwesomeTextView
implements BootstrapSizeView, OutlineableView, RoundableView, ButtonModeView
    BootstrapButtons are regular buttons styled with BootstrapBrand colors, roundable corners, and an 'outlineable' mode. It is possible to group together multiple buttons using BootstrapButtonGroup, allowing the use of different selection modes e.g. Checkbox/Radio group.

      • getBootstrapSize

        public float getBootstrapSize()
        Description copied from interface: BootstrapSizeView
        Retrieves the scale factor that should be used to scale a view from its baseline size. For example, specifying that a Button should use a scale factor of 2.0 may increase its padding and font size by that factor.
        Specified by:
        getBootstrapSize in interface BootstrapSizeView
        Returns:
        the scale factor
